summary: Applied professional LaTeX-like styling to Bimodal TM Logic Typst documentation. Migrated from great-theorems to thmbox package, added URLblue link styling, bold TOC chapters, centered Abstract, LaTeX-like typography (tight leading, first-line indent, margins), and new notation commands for duration-over-arrows and time-shift subscript/superscript stacking.

artifacts.summary: Template with thmbox theorem environments and URLblue color
Main document with LaTeX-like typography and styling
Notation module with overset and timeshift commands
Semantics chapter with updated notation usage

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented professional LaTeX-like styling for Bimodal TM Logic Typst documentation, including thmbox theorem environments, URLblue hyperlinks, LaTeX-like page layout and typography, and notation commands for mathematical expressions.

next_steps: Review compiled PDF for visual consistency and consider installing New Computer Modern Sans font to eliminate font warnings
